Demo/sample applications which can be run on Talaria TWO firmware.

1.  Alarm

2.  Analog to Digital Converter

3.  AT Custom Command

4.  Audio over I2S

5.  BLE 5.0

6.  BLE Beacons

7.  BLE Wi-Fi Bridge

8.  Chip Monitor

9.  Crash Handling

10. Filesystem

11. Firmware Over the Air Upgrade

12. GPIO

13. Host Interface Protocol

14. HTTP Client

15. I2C

16. IFTTT

17. IoT AWS

18. IoT Azure

19. Low Power Scan

20. Low Power UART

21. mDNS

22. Memory Management and Error Handling

23. Message Queues

24. MQTT

25. Provisioning

26. Pulse Width Modulation

27. Radio and Module Parameters

28. Secure Files

29. Simple Network Time Protocol

30. Sleep Enable\\Disable

31. Socket Wakeup

32. Software SPI Master

33. SPI Flash

34. SSBL

35. Thread and Semaphores

36. Throughput Measurement

37. Timers and Callouts

38. Unassociated Mode

39. Using Wi-Fi

40. Watchdog Timer

41. Websocket Client

42. Wi-Fi Connection Manager Multi-AP

43. Wi-Fi Power Management

44. Work Queues
